mapper.select: SELECT A.LECT_NUM, L.LECT_NAME, A.TEACHER_ID, A.DAY, A.BEGINTIME, A.ENDTIME, A.STATUS, T.NAME, S.SUBJ_NAME, B.BOOK_NAME, L.IMG, L.PRICE FROM ASSIGN_LECT A, TEACHER T, LECTURE L, BOOK B, SUBJECT S WHERE A.TEACHER_ID = T.ID AND A.LECT_NUM = L.LECT_NUM AND L.SUBJ_NUM = S.SUBJ_NUM AND L.BOOK_NUM = B.BOOK_NUM

SELECT A.ASSIGN_NUM, A.LECT_NUM, L.LECT_NAME, A.TEACHER_ID, A.DAY, A.BEGINTIME, A.ENDTIME, A.STATUS, T.NAME, S.SUBJ_NAME, B.BOOK_NAME, L.IMG, L.PRICE FROM ASSIGN_LECT A, TEACHER T, LECTURE L, BOOK B, SUBJECT S WHERE A.TEACHER_ID = T.ID AND A.LECT_NUM = L.LECT_NUM AND L.SUBJ_NUM = S.SUBJ_NUM AND L.BOOK_NUM = B.BOOK_NUM AND A.ASSIGN_NUM = #{assign_num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REG_LECT (REG_NUM, ASSIGN_NUM, MEMBER_ID, REG_DATE, PHONE, POST, ADDRESS, DETAIL_ADDRESS, EMAIL) VALUES (REG_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{assign_num}, #{member_id}, sysdate, #{phone}, #{post}, #{address}, #{detail_address}, #{email})
